mapper.select: select B.* from(select rownum rn, A.* from(select * from free_board order by num desc)A)B where rn between #{str} and #{end} and step=0
select count(*) from free_board where step=0
select C.* from(select rownum rn, B.* from(select A.* from (select*from free_board where step=0 and ${tag} like '%${word}%')A) B)C where rn between #{str} and #{end} order by num desc
select count(*) from free_board where ${tag} like '%${word}%' and step=0
mapper.insert: insert into free_board (num, nick, title, content, numgroup, step,indent) values(free_board_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{nick}, #{title}, #{content}, free_board_SEQ.currval, 0, 0)
mapper.update: update free_board set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where num=#{num}
update free_board set hit=hit+1 where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select * from free_board_comment where numgroup=#{numgroup} order by commentgroup asc, cnum asc
mapper.update: update free_board_comment set step=step+1 where numgroup=#{numgroup} and step > #{step}
update free_board_comment set content=#{content} where cnum=#{cnum}
